name: devlocker.tools.assetmanagement
description:
Asset management tools.
Tools:
- Scenes In Project - list of all available scenes in the project for quick access.
- Multi-Rename Tool - mass search and rename assets.
- Search References (FAST) - searches where selected asset is used (text search by guid).
- Search Prefabs Components - searches for components in prefabs.
- Search Duplicate Assets - searches duplicate assets (by name).

Usage: "Tools/Asset Management/...".
